feed.title: Track Awesome Digitalocean Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of amazingly awesome DigitalOcean resources inspired by Awesome Sysadmin

entry.title: Awesome Digitalocean Updates on Jun 14, 2020
entry.content:
Commercial integrations

  • SimpleBackups - Tool for scheduling DigitalOcean backups (files & databases) on auto-pilot.
  • Weap.io - Hourly to Daily DigitalOcean backups. Tool for scheduling more frequent DigitalOcean backups

entry.title: Awesome Digitalocean Updates on Aug 28, 2018
entry.content:
Community

  • Tutorial Search and Index
  • Community articles by tag
  • Questions
  • Projects
  • Meetups

Configuration management

  • Using Ansible with DigitalOcean
  • Terraform - DigitalOcean Provider
  • DigitalOcean in Action! (⭐12) - Example repo for using DigitalOcean with Terraform and Ansible.

Developer documentation

  • API
  • Spaces API
  • OAuth
  • Droplet Metadata
  • Official DO Release Notes - Notes tracking incremental improvements and major releases for the DigitalOcean cloud platform.

Open source projects

  • Open Source @ DigitalOcean
  • Netbox (⭐18k)
  • Doctl (⭐3.3k) - Official command-line interface for the DigitalOcean API.
  • go-libvirt (⭐1k)
  • go-qemu (⭐777)

Community OSS projects

  • do-sshuttle (⭐66) - Transparent Proxying via sshuttle to DigitalOcean Droplet.
  • drophosts (⭐1) - Update /etc/hosts with peer droplets.
  • droplan (⭐69) - Manage iptable rules for the private interface on DigitalOcean droplets.
  • foreman-digitalocean (⭐29) - Plugin to enable management of DigitalOcean droplets in Foreman.
  • lita-digitalocean (⭐25) - Lita handler for managing DigitalOcean services.
  • hostpool (⭐22) - Worker pool manager for DigitalOcean hosts.
  • DDNS (⭐262) - Personal DDNS client with DigitalOcean Networking DNS as backend.
  • Less Confusing Menus (⭐24) - A Chrome extension that makes account menus less confusing.
  • DigitalOcean Droplet creator (⭐3) - A dialog-based shell script to quickly create a single DigitalOcean Droplet.
  • do-upgrade-plans (⭐6) - A script to upgrade your DigitalOcean Droplets to better plans with the same cost.

Clients

  • doctl (⭐3.3k) - Command-line tool for DigitalOcean services.
  • digitalocean-indicator (⭐174) - Debian Gnome panel client.
  • domanager - Linux and Windows System Tray Client.
  • OceanBar (⭐69) - macOS menu bar client.
  • Tugboat (⭐1.4k) - Ruby command-line tool for DigitalOcean services, focusing on a more guided UX.

Video tutorials

  • Building a Kubernetes cluster on DigitalOcean using Kubicorn

Other

  • Reddit community
  • ##digitalocean on freenode
  • Engineering Code of Conduct (⭐293)
  • User Scripts (⭐803) - User data scripts to help provision apps on a Droplet.
  • Hacktoberfest - Month-long celebration of open source software in partnership with GitHub.
